topics.body:
Hey guys I was kind of curious, but if I ever do a Marvel MLP Crossover, should I make Zecora look sort of like Storm? I thought it'd be funny to have those two constantly confused for one another, as part of a story arc. 
Also Zecora/Black Panther ship would be interesting. I'd like to see how much Panther reacts to having a Zebra spirited woman as his wife.

topics.body: 30 states now have legal gay marriage and 59.1% of the population now lives in states where gay marriage is legal.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543c83f46368720e4a120000#post_543c83f46368720e4a120000
Which is a massive amount of progress, plus Pope Francis came out to talk about what the LGBT community has to offer the Christian community, and why they should be more understanding. Nothing on gay marriage yet, but one step at a time!

topics.body:
The Chosen One wandered aimlessly, seeking the man who stole his life from him.

And so he walked. 
And sometimes he drove.
And sometimes, he partied with the desert animals.
